person.bio: Humanist & motivated entrepreneur, passionate to help make the world a better place. Kristof strongly believes there is need for a neutral internet owned by millions.

node.title: ThreeFold Foundation
node.excerpt: The ThreeFold Foundation along with its partners is growing the ThreeFold Grid and a new peer-to-peer internet.
